[@cel](@f/6sQ6d2CMxRUhLpspgGIulDxDCwYD7DzFzPNr7u5AU=.ed25519)

Currently stuck here on Node 10:

```
[  ................] / fetchMetadata: sill resolveWithNewModule deep-equal@1.0.1 checking installable status
```

Anything I can do to help debug? I ran the first code block in your post, using latest Patchbay `master` in the background.

```
$ uname -a
Linux samus 4.18.5-arch1-1-ARCH #1 SMP PREEMPT Fri Aug 24 12:48:58 UTC 2018 x86_64 GNU/Linux
$ node --version
v10.9.0
$ npm --version
6.4.1
$ (cd ~/Source/patchbay/ && npx scuttlebot version)
"11.4.2"
```
